comments.text: Bug 652494 introduced an ignoreAllUncaughtExceptions() method in SimpleTest.js and browser-test.js for tests that currently have uncaught JS exceptions that would otherwise cause test failures.  Once these tests have been fixed, we can remove the method.
comments.author: cam@mcc.id.au
comments.creator: cam@mcc.id.au
comments.raw_text: Bug 652494 introduced an ignoreAllUncaughtExceptions() method in SimpleTest.js and browser-test.js for tests that currently have uncaught JS exceptions that would otherwise cause test failures.  Once these tests have been fixed, we can remove the method.

comments.author: cam@mcc.id.au
comments.text: There was also a problem with the bug 652494 patch that resulted in some browser chrome mochitests still not failing due to uncaught exceptions.
comments.creator: cam@mcc.id.au
comments.raw_text: There was also a problem with the bug 652494 patch that resulted in some browser chrome mochitests still not failing due to uncaught exceptions.

comments.creator: jmaher@mozilla.com
